summary: For The Republic - Jen425 - Star Wars - All Media Types, Star Wars Episode VIII - The Last Jedi, Star Wars Prequel Trilogy, Star...
title: For The Republic - Jen425 - Star Wars - All Media Types, Star Wars Episode VIII - The Last Jedi, Star Wars Prequel Trilogy, Star Wars: The Clone Wars (2008) - All Media Types [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
For the Republic by Jen425

Summary: Shadow Warriors AU. Padme is given a choice, follow her heart or protect the Republic…

And she chooses the Republic.

And in doing so, she saves it.

…After all, shattered minds may reveal more than you even knew was there.

summary: o fuk yea it’s time for chapter 2 of Who even kidnaps a Sith anyway? shorter and more expositiony chapter this time, but the...
body:
o fuk yea it’s time for chapter 2 of Who even kidnaps a Sith anyway?

shorter and more expositiony chapter this time, but the good news is next time the plot is gonna properly pick up now our gang have a name, a location, and a plan. at this point i’m estimating we’re gonna reach 4 or 5 chapters total but we’ll see how that goes.

tags: things that will probably (not) happen in episode ix
summary: I'm honestly torn because as much as I want Rey to be a practical, no nonsense "you don't have to put your heroine in fancy...
body:
I’m honestly torn because as much as I want Rey to be a practical, no nonsense “you don’t have to put your heroine in fancy dresses for girls to like her” type character, I also really want to see her in a big fancy dress for Episode IX because

a) Daisy Ridley is beautiful.

b) We would get to see Ben react to Rey in a dress.

tags: long essay explaining why i love hux
summary: So someone asked me why Hux is my favorite character on Reddit! He was probably surprised because Hux is supposed to be a...
body:
So someone asked me why Hux is my favorite character on Reddit! He was probably surprised because Hux is supposed to be a character you hate or don’t care about!

But then, why has Hux become my favorite character then? I know I’m not the only one because we’re on tumblr and there are a lot of blogs dedicated to Hux out there lol!

So wanted to ask the community! Why do you like/love Hux? Is Hux your favorite character?

Personally, yes Hux is my favorite Star Wars character! I have a lot of other Star Wars characters I like (Ahsoka, Obi-Wan, Dooku, General Grievous, Kylo, Finn, Rose) but not as much as Hux for some reasons!

When I first saw TFA, was intrigued by Hux (never heard about Domhnall before btw)! What surprised me is that he was a General at such a young age, completely in control of the military! We could see that he was someone ambitious, in control, didn’t seem to fear anyone (even Snoke at the time)!

And omg that Starkiller Base speech! It was so over the top, liked it so much and that creepy look in his eyes! Omg! 😯

Also loved the tension between him/Kylo! Didn’t ship them back then (didn’t know about tumblr/Ao3 lol)! Thought they had a nice sibling rivalry relashionship! How much Hux could get under the skin of such a powerful Force user like Kylo! It was really entertaining to see!

Then there’s TLJ! I know a lot of people were disappointed with how RJ treated Hux’s character in the movie! But you know what? That movie made me like Hux even more! Yes he really became my fave with this movie! I know it’s surprising but hear what I have to say:

Hux stayed the same between the 2 movies, TLJ is just Hux really bad day! Yes I’m sure we all had a very bad day at school/work in our life! And that during that day we all made very bad mistakes (because of a illness/not sleeping enough/mental problem…) or/and everyone treated us like crap!

Remember in TLJ, Hux is not in control anymore! His life’s project was destroyed in just a day! And I’m sure that he spent decades working on it!

Yes I can’t deny that Hux made horrible strategic mistakes during the movie but I think his judgement was clouded by strong emotions like anger/rage/fear! There’s also the fact that he was terribly sleep deprived and I’m sure Snoke already tortured him via holocall between the two movies! Maybe force choking him and telling him “don’t fail me General” or something like that!

Just imagine yourself if you were in his shoes, wouldn’t you be so pissed at the people who destroyed your life’s project? (Don’t forget that you also didn’t sleep for days!)

Then it’s completely understandable that he would want the Resistance members to suffer and not destroy them immediatly, to make their agony last! There’s also the fact that Hux has flaws (yes like every humans)! Remember that he’s a narcissistic person, that he likes to be at the center of the attention! I also find it hilarious that everyone hate his guts but he’s like: “Yep, I don’t care what you think of me!”

I also admire the way that he stays strong despite all the abuse inflicted on him! I mean he was humilitated in front of his whole crew by Poe, slammed onto the floor by Snoke, bitten by Rose, Force choked by Kylo and slammed onto the wall by Kylo again! And the guy still not giving up! He have a very strong will and yes I admire him for that!

You know I was bullied at school during my childhood/teenage years and I think this is one of the reasons I like his character so much! Yeah even with all the abuse/bullying he suffered, he still manages to stay strong no matter what! Kylo/Snoke is his real problem because yeah, how can you defend yourself against the Force? And I like Kylo but I hated when he used the Force to bully Hux and I rooted for Hux the entire time!

After watching TLJ, I also read his backstory and it was really tragic:

-He was an unwanted child

-He was brainwashed by his father/the First Order!

-Nobody showed him any love during all his life! (Some of you might say: What about Rae? Rae was just a strict mentor and nothing else)

-Was exposed to violence/fear ever since he was a toddler!

-His father abused him physically/mentally and always reminded him that he was weak/useless…

Then no wonder he became such a horrible human being as an adult! I think even Rae said that something was wrong with his behavior at 5 years old, so imagine as an adult!

I like to imagine that he could have been a good person if the New Republic saved him as a kid, helped him to overcome his traumas with doctors!

Of course his childhood doesn’t excuse his actions, killing billions of people! And I think that he must pay for his crimes! I would like a redemption arc for him in Ep IX but I’m afraid his crimes are too great!

Ok this post really got out of hand right? I was talking about why I like Hux in TFA, defending him in TLJ, then talking about his backstory! But if you’re able to read all of this lol, you’ll understand why I love Hux so much!

There’s also the fact that I like men in military uniforms and ginger hair color (so beautiful)! 😁

There’s also the fact that I like men in military uniforms and ginger hair color (so beautiful)! 😁

-He was brainwashed by his father/the First Order!

-Nobody showed him any love during all his life! (Some of you might say: What about Rae? Rae was just a strict mentor and nothing else)

-Was exposed to violence/fear ever since he was a toddler!

-His father abused him physically/mentally and always reminded him that he was weak/useless…

Then no wonder he became such a horrible human being as an adult! I think even Rae said that something was wrong with his behavior at 5 years old, so imagine as an adult!

I like to imagine that he could have been a good person if the New Republic saved him as a kid, helped him to overcome his traumas with doctors!

Of course his childhood doesn’t excuse his actions, killing billions of people! And I think that he must pay for his crimes! I would like a redemption arc for him in Ep IX but I’m afraid his crimes are too great!

Ok this post really got out of hand right? I was talking about why I like Hux in TFA, defending him in TLJ, then talking about his backstory! But if you’re able to read all of this lol, you’ll understand why I love Hux so much!

There’s also the fact that I like men in military uniforms and ginger hair color (so beautiful)! 😁

blog.name: mandowords
blog.title: Miit'alor
blog.description: I am a descriptivist linguist for the Mando'a language. I show what it can do, not what it MUST do. This is a place for discussion about Mando'a, and Mandalorian society and culture. Feel free to use the head cannons from this blog (or reblogged from others) in your RP or writing. All words and descriptions are taken from the mandoa.org Mandalorian Dictionary. Want to support this blog? Buy me a Kofi? OR buy some Mando'a themed items? Visit our Discord? Blog icon by Rina

title: Ты моя весна
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2SpfPDC

by Ginger_Squirrel

Верховный Лидер безумен! Да здравствует Верховный Лидер!

————————————————————————————————————————

Дрожащими потрескавшимися губами он прикоснулся к её руке, ощущая наконец-то неповторимый аромат солнца, вдыхая его полной грудью и не обращая внимания на боль. И уже на границе между явью и смертью Кайло услышал:
— Я не пришла тебя спасать. Я пришла вернуть тебя домой.

summary: The fault in our Star Wars
title: The fault in our Star Wars
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2UAIJ0W

by Milky_Maid

A princess and knight are set to wed, but due to complications; the wedding is crashed and so is their future.

A year or two later, the two meet in very a very akward situation.

The Husband and Wife fight.

That’s the story folks!

Дрожащими потрескавшимися губами он прикоснулся к её руке, ощущая наконец-то неповторимый аромат солнца, вдыхая его полной грудью и не обращая внимания на боль. И уже на границе между явью и смертью Кайло услышал:
— Я не пришла тебя спасать. Я пришла вернуть тебя домой.
